The task is to identify and extract the specific line items and value of cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period.

   |-----------------------|------------|------------|
   | Cash and Cash Equivalents |          | 2024-02-01 |
   | Beginning Balance      | 8000000.00 | 2024-02-01 |
   | Ending Balance        | 2664809.03 | 2024-02-01 |

2. The specific requested item is the "Beginning Balance" of cash and cash equivalents at the start of the period, which is **8000000.00**.
